restaurants.name: Trappeze Pub
restaurants.description: A vibrant warm interior with intimate booths, plenty of bar and outdoor seating, and larger tables to accommodate groups, have helped us develop and maintain a built-in crowd of devoted regulars and a regional reputation for offering the highest quality products, providing the finest customer service and a commitment to delivering the most unique products available anywhere.

dishes.name: Steak Frites
dishes.description: 8 oz Buckhead Beef hanger // Belgian fries // béarnaise compound butter

dishes.description: half-rack of 1855 all natural pork back ribs // sweet and tangy BBQ sauce // Belgian fries (available at 5pm daily)

restaurants.name: Seabear Oyster Bar
restaurants.description: Seabear Oyster Bar merges high quality, innovatively prepared seafood with the warmth of casual bar fare. It’s meant to be a neighborhood place—intimate and unassuming.

dishes.name: crab and shrimp cakes
dishes.description: remoulade, micro greens

dishes.name: Steamed Mussels
dishes.description: green curry, coconut milk, lemongrass, cilantro, fresh baguette

dishes.name: Beer-braised Beeler's Bratwerst
dishes.description: sauerkraut, mustard, greens in a Holman & Finch bun with fries

dishes.name: Tybee Island Shrimp & Grits
dishes.description: andouille sausage, lacinato kale, celery, and onions over Red Mule grits

dishes.name: Crispy Scallion Pancake
dishes.description: sweet rock crab, spicy mayo, radish, little greens

restaurants.name: Rumbi Island Grill
restaurants.description: Rumbi Island Grill is distinguished by our fresh, healthy and full flavored menu. The menu includes fresh gourmet rice bowls, crisp salads, soup, sandwiches, burgers, and entrèes. Favorites include the Voodoo Chicken Salad and Hawaiian Teriyaki Rice Bowl, along with main entrèes like the Luau Pork Plate and Volcano-Blackened Mahi or Salmon.

dishes.name: Rice Bowl
dishes.description: Your choice of protein, rice, and sauteed vegitables.

dishes.name: Kahuna Burger
dishes.description: Two USDA Choice ground beef patties marinated in teriyaki sauce, grilled pineapple, swiss cheese, lettuce, tomato, & mayo.

dishes.name: VooDoo Salad
dishes.description: A fresh lettuce blend with your choice protein, marinated in our famouse jerk seasoning, roma tomatoes, feta cheese and tortilla strips, with sesame ginger vinaigrette.

dishes.name: Cabo Fish Tacos
dishes.description: Tortillas stuffed with blackened seasonal fish, tropical salsa, cabbage, cilantro, scallions, and our cool Jalapeno Ranch Dressing. Served with Rumbi Rice (coconut rice and red beans).

dishes.name: Sweet Potato Fries
dishes.description: A mix of sweet potato & regular french fries with Rumbi Fry Sauce. Zero trans fat per serving.

restaurants.name: Zupas
restaurants.description: We’re food explorers. With inspiration from all over the world, we are always hard at work in our test kitchen, creating the exceptional and unique soups.

dishes.name: Tomato Basil w/Orzo Pasta
dishes.description: This soup has been a customer favorite since the beginning– it’s new and nostalgic at the same time. Ours features grown-up flavors of House-Made pesto that we make with six pounds of fresh basil, right off the stems in each of our kitchens. Sauteed aromatics and our special blend of spices this soup special. Garnished with fresh orzo pasta.

dishes.name: Garden Chowder
dishes.description: We’ve loaded this delicious soup with with fresh vegetables like diced zucchini, fresh tomatoes, fire roasted corn, carrots, celery, and onions. Our special blend of herbs and spices combine with a lovely cream broth. This soup is a hearty, vegetarian-friendly treat that everyone will love.

dishes.name: New England Clam Chowder
dishes.description: Our signature blend of herbs and spices make this clam chowder a masterpiece. You’ll love the creamy broth and the careful balance between clams, red skin potatoes, and aromatic vegetables. Customize it with a mix-in like applewood-smoked bacon or focaccia croutons.

dishes.name: Yucatan Chicken Tortilla
dishes.description: A deliciously spiced broth makes home to our all-natural grilled chicken, fire-roasted corn, and freshly-diced tomatoes. Topped with Hass avocado, tortilla strips, and lime, this soup makes a satisfying summer-time soup.

dishes.name: Lobster Bisque
dishes.description: Fennel, carrots, celery, and onions saute with our signature blend of herbs and spices in a touch of sherry wine. We add in a real lobster blend and simmer in a creamy broth with fresh diced tomatoes. You have to taste it to believe it.

dishes.name: Sake
dishes.description: Salmon Nigiri Sushi

dishes.name: Maguro
dishes.description: Bluefin Tuna Sashimi

dishes.name: Spicy Tuna
dishes.description: Tuna,‎ green leaf, cucumber, sprout and spicy mayo

dishes.name: Shrimp Tempura Roll

dishes.name: Hamachi
dishes.description: Yellow Tail Nigiri Sushi

dishes.name: Ebi

dishes.name: Mushroom Saute
dishes.description: local mushroom sauté, dashi-butter, poached egg, toasted pine nuts

dishes.name: Pork Ramen
dishes.description: kurobuta pork belly, green onion, poached egg, kamaboko (japanese fish cake), house-made ramen broth

restaurants.name: Taco Bell
restaurants.description: Fast-food chain serving Mexican-inspired fare such as tacos, quesadillas & nachos.

dishes.name: Chicken Fiesta Taco Salad
dishes.description: Crispy tortilla bowl filled with marinated all - white meat chicken, and loaded with chunky beans, real cheddar cheese.

dishes.name: Crunchy Taco
dishes.description: Crunchy, corn taco shell filled with seasoned ground beef, crisp shredded lettuce, and real cheddar cheese

dishes.name: Triple Steak Burrito
dishes.description: Triple portion of marinated thick cut steak, seasoned rice , cheddar cheese, fire roasted salsa , and reduced fat sour cream.

restaurants.name: McDonalds
restaurants.description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers, fries & shakes.

dishes.name: Premium Bacon Ranch Salad
dishes.description: Fresh mixed greens and sumptuous grape tomatoes, getting along brilliantly with hickory-smoked bacon

dishes.name: Angus Chipotle Bbq Bacon
dishes.description: 100% angus beef smothered in sensationally sweet 'n smoky chipotle bbq sauce.

dishes.name: Chicken Mcnuggets
dishes.description: Tender, juicy chicken mcnuggets made with white meat, wrapped up in a crisp tempura batter.

restaurants.name: Wendy's
restaurants.description: Fast-food burger chain known for its shakes, as well as sides such as chili & baked potatoes.

dishes.name: Baja Salad
dishes.description: Hearty salad with a southwest flair, featuring fresh pico de gallo, guacamole and slow simmered chili.

dishes.name: Dave's Hot 'n Juicy 1/4 Lb. Single
dishes.description: Quarter-pound of 100% real north american beef and the freshest premium toppings on buttered, toasted buns - our new gold standard!

dishes.name: Jr. Bacon Cheeseburger
dishes.description: Hot 'n juicy beef. loaded with american cheese and fresh-cooked, thick-cut applewood smoked bacon. guaranteed to satisfy.
